price: 67. Toysa ninni xaquk kaxxa galto keenih acuwak nen Addunyaay Akeeral.
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
